mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.spu_id,a.base_sale_attr_id,a.sale_attr_name,v.id vid,v.sale_attr_value_name FROM spu_sale_attr a INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value v ON a.spu_id = v.spu_id AND a.base_sale_attr_id = v.base_sale_attr_id WHERE a.spu_id = #{spuId}

SELECT t1.id, t1.sale_attr_name, t1.base_sale_attr_id, t1.spu_id, t2.id vid, t2.sale_attr_value_name, t3.sku_id, IF(t3.sku_id IS NULL,0,1) is_checked FROM spu_sale_attr t1 INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value t2 ON t1.base_sale_attr_id = t2.base_sale_attr_id AND t1.spu_id = t2.spu_id LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value t3 ON t2.id = t3.sale_attr_value_id AND t3.sku_id = #{skuId} WHERE t2.spu_id = #{spuId} ORDER BY t1.base_sale_attr_id
